text: (viśvāsavantayini!) oba kumak kerehi viśvāsaya tæbūvehuda, ē ākārayaṭama ovunda viśvāsa kaḷahot niyata vaśayenma ovun ṛju mārgaya at kara gannehuya. ovun pratikṣēpa kara hæriyahot niyata vaśayenma (puhu) muraṇḍukamehima siṭinnāha. ovun gæna obaṭa (kisi biyak avaśya næta!) allāh pramāṇavatya. tavada ohu (ovungē kumantraṇakārī vadan) savan denneku hā (ovungē vaṁcanikabhāvaya) hon̆din danneku vaśayenda siṭinnēya
